questions.question: Which of the following is a prime number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: A prime number is a number greater than 1 that is only divisible by 1 and itself. 17 is prime.

questions.question: What type of number is 0?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: 0 is an even number because it is divisible by 2.

questions.question: Which of the following is a natural number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Natural numbers are the positive integers (1, 2, 3, ...). 2 is a natural number.

questions.question: What is the largest prime number less than 10?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The largest prime number less than 10 is 7.

questions.question: Which of the following is a rational number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Rational numbers are numbers that can be expressed as a ratio of two integers. 1/3 is a rational number.

questions.question: What is the smallest positive integer?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The smallest positive integer is 1.

questions.question: Which of the following is a whole number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Whole numbers are non-negative integers, including zero. 0 is a whole number.

questions.question: What type of number is 5?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: 5 is an odd number because it is not divisible by 2.

questions.question: Which of the following is an irrational number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Irrational numbers cannot be expressed as a simple fraction. √2 is irrational.

questions.question: What is the product of 2 and 1?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The product of any number and 1 is that number itself.

questions.question: What type of number is 42?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: 42 is an even number because it is divisible by 2.

questions.question: Which of the following is a composite number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Composite numbers have more than two factors. 8 is a composite number.

questions.question: What is the value of π (pi) to two decimal places?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The value of π (pi) to two decimal places is approximately 3.14.

questions.question: What is the square of 9?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The square of 9 is 81 because 9 * 9 = 81.

questions.question: Which of the following is a perfect square?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: A perfect square is a number that is the square of an integer. 36 is a perfect square.

questions.question: What is the smallest prime number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The smallest prime number is 2.

questions.question: What is the absolute value of -8?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The absolute value of a number is its distance from 0 on the number line. The absolute value of -8 is 8.

questions.question: What is the next prime number after 29?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The next prime number after 29 is 31.

questions.question: What is the result of 7 divided by 0?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Division by zero is undefined in mathematics.

questions.question: What type of number is 0.5?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: 0.5 is a rational number because it can be expressed as a ratio of two integers.

questions.question: Which of the following is a square number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: A square number is the result of multiplying an integer by itself. 9 is a square number.

questions.question: What is the sum of the first three prime numbers?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The first three prime numbers are 2, 3, and 5. Their sum is 10.

questions.question: What is the value of e (Euler's number) to two decimal places?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The value of e (Euler's number) to two decimal places is approximately 2.71.

questions.question: Which of the following is an integer?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Integers are whole numbers, both positive and negative. 5 is an integer.

questions.question: What is the result of any positive integer raised to the power of 0?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Any non-zero number raised to the power of 0 is 1. 0^0 is undefined.

questions.question: What is the smallest odd prime number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The smallest odd prime number is 3.

questions.question: What is the value of √16 (square root of 16)?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The square root of 16 is 4 because 4 * 4 = 16.

questions.question: Which of the following is a negative number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: -2 is a negative number because it is less than 0.

questions.question: What is the result of 1 divided by 1?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The result of 1 divided by 1 is 1.

questions.question: Which of the following is not a real number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: i is the imaginary unit and is not a real number.

questions.question: What is the sum of the first four prime numbers?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The first four prime numbers are 2, 3, 5, and 7. Their sum is 17.

questions.question: Which of the following is a non-negative integer?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Non-negative integers include 0 and all positive integers.

questions.question: What is the largest negative integer?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: -1 is the largest negative integer.

questions.question: What is the absolute value of 0?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The absolute value of 0 is 0, as it is the distance from 0 on the number line.

questions.question: What is the result of 10 divided by 5?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: The result of 10 divided by 5 is 2.

questions.question: Which of the following is a complex number?
questions.correctAnswerDescription: Complex numbers have a real part and an imaginary part. 3 + 4i is a complex number.

questions.correctAnswerDescription: The smallest composite number is 6 because it has factors other than 1 and itself.

questions.correctAnswerDescription: Any non-zero number raised to the power of 0 is 1.

questions.correctAnswerDescription: The sum of 6 and 0 is 6.
